question.statment: When something really amuses you, You react with ...

choice.line: a laugh, but not a loud one

question.statment: When you go to a party or social gathering, you...

choice.line: make a loud entrance so everyone notices you
make a quiet entrance, looking around for someone you know
make the quietest entrance, trying to stay unnoticed

question.statment: When you're working or concentrating very hard, and you're interrupted, you...
You get lost in the wood and suddenly you came across a split in the trail.. which path would you take?
At what time of day do you do your best thinking?

choice.line: At the end of the day.
When I am on my own.
When I am faced with challenge.
After a cup of tea in the morning.
When I spent time with sketch book.

question.statment: Is the glass half-empty or half-full?
Who is your favorite family member?
